scenes.background: After responding to your colleague, you continue your leave. The next day, [Monica] and [Bob] approach you in the break room. [Monica] leads the conversation, while [Bob] stands by, seemingly supportive but silent.
scenes.description: Monica crosses her arms and raises an eyebrow, 'Hey, we noticed you didn’t help out with the task yesterday. It put a lot of pressure on the team. What’s your justification?'

options.text: I thought my break was important to maintain my productivity.

options.text: I apologize if it caused any trouble. I needed that time to recharge.

options.text: I understand it was tough, but my break was planned long ago.

next_scene.description: Monica takes a deep breath, 'We get that you needed time off, but it really affected our schedule. How do you plan to make it up to us?'

options.text: I'll take on extra tasks this week to compensate.
